articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Algerian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Algerian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Ahcene Boukhelfa, Algerian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Meets New Algerian Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Meets New Algerian Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho had a talk with Ahcene Boukhelfa, Algerian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him Wednesday.
					 The foreign minister referred to the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in the drive for carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. He underscored the stand of the DPRK government to steadily develop the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 The Algerian ambassador said that the bilateral relations are the historic relations of friendship and cooperation which has been developed since the national liberation struggle of Algeria, adding the two countries have supported with each other in the international arena. He noted that Algeria is attaching great importance to developing the friendly relations with the Korean people.
					
					 He said he would make positive efforts to develop the bilateral relations in the political, economic, cultural and other fields.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Guinea Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Guinea Appointed
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Ri Chong Gyong was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Guinea, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies Forwards Open Questionnaire to UN
articles.content:
DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies Forwards Open Questionnaire to UN
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies issued open questionnaire addressed to the UN on Wednesday as regards the fact that the Third Committee of the 71st UN General Assembly railroaded the "resolution on human rights in north Korea" on Nov. 15.
					 The U.S. and some EU countries following it, the Japanese reactionaries and other riff-raffs fabricated the "resolution on human rights in north Korea" once again, an unpardonable violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK and a grave state-sponsored terrorist act aimed to bring down its socials system, the open questionnaire said.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces maliciously hurt even the supreme dignity of the DPRK which all its service personnel and people regard as the whole of their life, destiny and future by abusing the UN. This is a hideous provocative act which deserves resolute and merciless punishment, the open questionnaire noted.
					
					 The DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies made the following open questionnaire, expressing resentment at the unreasonable behavior of the UN which adopted the self-opinionated "resolution" without a single visit to the country concerned while interfering in the internal affairs of a dignified sovereign state at the prodding of the hostile forces against the DPRK, being bereft of the decency as an authoritative international organization:
					
					1. Does the UN know about the stirring reality of the DPRK in which the ordinary working masses exercise genuine political right, which is basic criterion of human rights, as the master of society.
					
					2. Does the UN know about the reality of the DPRK in which the interests of the people are prioritized and everything is concentrated on improving the people's living standard despite the persistent sanctions and pressure by the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					3. Does the UN know about the reality of the DPRK which substantially guarantees and provides the genuine rights of human beings including the right to learn, the right to receive medical treatment and the right to labor.
					
					4. Does the UN know that the act of daring to hurt and slander the supreme dignity of the DPRK is an unpardonable hideous provocation against all its service personnel and people and the act will invite their merciless retaliation and punishment.
					
					 The DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies stressed that the UN should not evade the answer to the open questionnaire.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Officials Visit Meari Shooting Gallery
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Officials Visit Meari Shooting Gallery
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Mansour Chavoshi, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials visited the Meari Shooting Gallery Wednesday on the week for Korea-Iran friendship.
					 They went round different places of the gallery and spent pleasant time playing shooting games. 
					
					 Earlier, they visited Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies and Korea-Iran Friendship Jungsin Senior Secondary School in Sosong District.

articles.title: Anniversary of Victory in Yonphyong Island Shelling Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Victory in Yonphyong Island Shelling Marked
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- An army-people joint rally took place in Kangryong County, South Hwanghae Province Wednesday to mark the sixth anniversary of the victory in the Yonphyong Island shelling. 
					 The victory in the Yonphyong Island shelling in which the south Korean puppet warmongers suffered bitter defeat after hurting the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK six years ago was the event which clearly proved once again how miserable the end of the provokers obsessed with confrontation with the fellow countrymen is. And it was the meaningful declaration that the DPRK's just retaliatory strike would show no mercy to the enemies. 
					
					 Present at the rally were Ri Song Guk, commander of the Fourth Corps of the Korean People's Army; Pak Yong Ho, chairman of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK); and officers and soldiers of the Korean Peoples' Army including the soldiers who took part in the Yonphyong Island shelling and people from all walks of life in the county.
					
					 Working people in Kangryong County presented bouquets and garlands to the soldiers who displayed their valor in the Yonphyong Island shelling, warmly congratulating them.
					
					 Ri Song Guk said in a speech that the brilliant victory in the Yonphyong Island shelling was the great event which fully displayed over the world the matchless stamina of the heroic Korean People's Army (KPA) under the leadership of the great brilliant Songun commanders and recorded a page of proud victory of war in the history of Songun Korea.
					
					 Kim Pong Hyon, chairman of the Kangryong County Committee of the WPK, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 Speeches were made by Ri Hyon Myong, officer of the KPA, Kim Ryong Jin, commissioned officer, and Jong Song Guk, first secretary of the Kangryong Country Committee of the youth league. 
					
					 At the end of the rally a congratulatory performance was given by members of the art squad of the KPA unit and the itinerant art squad of Kangryong County.

articles.title: Stamps Reflecting Air Sports Issued
articles.content:
Stamps Reflecting Air Sports Issued
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued new stamps (three individuals) dealing with air sports.
					 Depicted in the stamps are a skydiver dropping on a designated place and model gliders.
					
					 The public interest in air sports has grown deeper in the country on the occasion of the Wonsan International Friendship Air Festival-2016, which took place in the port city of Wonsan in September.
					
					 The Korean Aviation Association acceded to the International Aeronautical Federation in September Juche 48 (1959).

articles.title: Products Made with Jonghyang Compound Lactobacilli Popular among DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Products Made with Jonghyang Compound Lactobacilli Popular among DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Products made with Jonghyang compound lactobacilli won great popularity at the 20th National Exhibition of Sports Scientific and Technological Achievements held here some days ago. They include nutritive powder, drinks and sanitary goods.
					 Jonghyang compound lactobacillus contains 10-odd kinds of lactic acid bacteria, organic acid, vitamins, amino acid and other physiological activators.
					
					 It supplies essential nutriments to human body and is very efficacious for detoxication.
					
					 The nutritive powder made with it helps treat diabetes and hyperlipemia and prevent aging and promotes the growth of children. And Jonghyang cleaner, one of functional sanitary goods, is helpful to the health care for women.
					
					 The said products were developed by the Cheryokjungjin Company.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stepping up Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement for Powerful Socialist Country
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stepping up Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement for Powerful Socialist Country
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The three revolutions, ideological, technical and cultural, are the tasks of the continued revolution that should be carried out in the whole period of building socialism and a powerful driving force for the building of a socialist power, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial.
					 The three-revolution red flag movement is an all-people mass movement for stepping up socialist construction by dynamically conducting the ideological, technical and cultural revolutions.
					
					 The building of a powerful socialist country is, in essence, a struggle to transform all fields of ideology, technology and culture as required by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Only when the three-revolution red flag movement is powerfully conducted, is it possible to significantly increase the might of a political and ideological power, military power and youth power and attain ahead of schedule the goals of a scientific and technological power, economic giant and highly civilized nation at the highest speed.
					
					 Today the imperialist reactionaries are resorting to the unprecedented moves for stifling the DPRK in a bid to prevent the Korean people from building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 Pinning their last hope on the changed conditions and circumstances in which the old generation of the revolution is replaced by a new one and the young people are emerging a main force of the revolution, the enemies are employing all base means and methods in all the political, ideological, economic, technological and cultural fields.
					
					 Now is the time for us to firmly defend the lineage of the Juche revolution, our ideology, social system and culture from the anti-socialist moves of the imperialists and make socialism fundamentally different from capitalism in all aspects.
					
					 We should win a decisive victory of socialism over capitalism by stepping up the three-revolution red flag movement. This is the way for the Korean revolutionaries to eternally glorify the immortal feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by devoting themselves to the socialist cause of Juche and creditably fulfill the important mission and duty they assumed before the times and history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms "Threat" Cited by U.S., Japan and S. Korean Puppet Forces Hypocritical
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms "Threat" Cited by U.S., Japan and S. Korean Puppet Forces Hypocritical
Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff, the chairman of the Joint Staff of Japan and the chairman of the south Korean puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff were recently closeted in Washington over the proposal for cooperation in coping with the "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK.
					This was followed by the huddle of diplomatic deputy chiefs of the U.S., Japan and south Korea in Tokyo to discuss countermeasures against the DPRK. 
					
					Timed to coincide with this there took place bilateral talks at different levels between the U.S. and Japan, between the U.S. and south Korea, and between Japan and south Korea to cope with the "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					They do not hide the fact that the frequent U.S., Japan and south Korea joint military drills are targeted on the DPRK.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary that the "threat" from the DPRK persistently touted by the U.S., Japan and the south Korean puppet forces is nothing but a deceptive artifice to cover up their provocative nature.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The sinister aim sought by the U.S. in vociferating about the "threat" from the DPRK is to give a shot in the arms of Japan and south Korean puppet forces for fabricating a NATO-type military bloc, containing the regional powers with a collective military edge and thus realizing their aggressive ambition for domination.
					
					The DPRK is the primary target of the NATO of Asian version.
					
					It will never remain a passive onlooker to the formation of the aggressive triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					The DPRK will bolster up its nuclear deterrent both in quality and quantity to beat back the aggression by the hostile forces while invariably adhering to the party's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Can Never Quell Voices of Justice: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Can Never Quell Voices of Justice: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group is resorting to all base moves such as red herrings, tail cutting and "security crisis" racket in a bid to tide over the worst ruling crisis but she cannot escape the miserable fate already sealed, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The hideous political scandal in south Korea was exposed by media for the first time, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The case is being fully laid bare day by day by conscientious media persons unyielding to injustice, violence and threat.
					
					 Such media activities in south Korea are the just and righteous actions to fully discharge their responsibility and role as the mouthpieces of justice and truth and pioneers in the era.
					
					 Almost all media of south Korea gave wide publicity to the Nov. 12 one million-people candlelight rally called "November resistance for democracy" all at once, fully reflecting the people's demand for traitor Park's resignation.
					
					 This stands in sharp contrast to the time when "media disaster" as serious as the ferry Sewol sinking occurred in 2014. At that time the Park group gagged fair media through fascist violence and let ultra-right conservative media mislead public opinion.
					
					 Many media institutions in south Korea including the Media Trade Union, the Journalists Association, the Association of Broadcasting Technicians, the Citizens Association for Democratic Media and the Citizens Solidarity for Media Reforms formed the Measure Council for Emergency Situation of Media Organizations to join in the actions of people of all socials standings.
					
					 Some right-wing conservative media are working overtly and covertly to patronize the Park group while adjusting the scope of news coverage in a bid to dampen the spirit of people from all walks of life participating in actions but this is a foolish act of those who are unable to judge the trend of the times.
					
					 The south Korean people's mindset has already passed an irreversible stern judgment on traitor Park.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Slammed for Pushing forward System of Introducing "State-Compiled History Textbooks"
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Slammed for Pushing forward System of Introducing "State-Compiled History Textbooks"
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the puppet vice prime minister and concurrently minister of education of south Korea, addressing the "National Assembly", blustered he would push forward the system of introducing "state-compiled history textbooks" under any circumstances as it should be dealt with "separately from the Choe Sun Sil case".
					 Meanwhile, gentries of the puppet Ministry of Education said that "state-compiled history textbooks" now at the stage of final examination would be distributed to secondary and high schools across south Korea from around February next year.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said moves are unpardonable anti-national criminal act to benumb the rising generation's consciousness of independence and render the south Korean society thoroughly reactionary and conservative and to seriously falsify the truth of history. 
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the above-said moves were invented by Choe Sun Sil, a wandering shaman.
					
					 Not content with mocking at the south Korean people and driving the inter-Korean relations into catastrophe at the prodding of such pseudo religious leader and ghost shaman as Choe Sun Sil, the Park group are working hard to twist history by stretching tentacles even to history textbooks for students. They deserve a stern judgment by the whole nation.
					
					 It is foolish, indeed, for such old witch of Chongwadae more dead than alive, forsaken by the people, to push forward the system of introducing "state-compiled history textbooks" quite contrary to the trend of the times.
					
					 The Park group had better bear in mind that such moves will only precipitate their ruin.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Calls on Media to Represent Mindset of People
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Calls on Media to Represent Mindset of People
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- These days south Korean media have a field-day covering all aspects of extra-large political scandal of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					 JTBC, Kukmin Ilbo, OhmyNews, Minjok Ilbo and many other media vie with each other to file stories about the scandal.
					
					 The south Korean online paper Voice of People said the scandal is a serious "breach of national discipline" and it is something unimaginable even in the period of the feudal dynasty.
					
					 Media convey the voices of people from all walks of life, saying that "the present government and president are targets of impeachment as they committed such hideous illegal acts and abused power." Even ultra-right conservative media ridicule the poor position of Park Geun Hye, turning their back on her.
					
					 As asserted by CBS, more than one million south Korean people irrespective of ideology and political tendency gathered in one place because citizens were angered by the scandal which brought down the foundation of society.
					
					 Media activities probing the truth behind the extra-large scandal irrespective of progressive forces and conservative forces are very just and righteous ones reflecting the media persons' resolution to creditably fulfill the responsibility and role as mouthpiece of justice and truth and pioneers of the era.
					
					 As media reported, this scandal is not an individual case of Choe Sun Sil and some confidants in Chongwadae and the administration but the extra-large power-backed scandal perpetrated by Park Geun Hye, the boss of the conservative forces.
					
					 Cases of the MIR Foundation and the K Sports Foundation and others are the inevitable products of the traitorous rule enforced by Park who unhesitatingly drove the whole south Korean society into death for accumulating wealth and meeting greed of herself and confidants.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that there will occur more "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandals" as long as such conservative forces as Park stay in power.
					
					 The mindset of the angry people demands a total change in the corrupt political landscape in south Korea.
					
					 The mindset of the people has already passed an irreversible stern judgment on Park.
					
					 What she fears most is the unity of public and media in action.
					
					 That is why Park Geun Hye and the south Korean puppet authorities insist that the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal" is a "huge plot" hatched by some media and opposition parties for popular agitation and suppressed the media organs which disclosed the truth behind the Jong Yun Hoe's interference in "state affairs" on charge of "violation of the document leakage".
					
					 If media are to escape the brutal suppression by the fascist dictators and win back genuine freedom, they  should not play the role of paid trumpeter and "guard" of the corrupt regime but fulfill their duty responding to the mindset of the people.
					
					 Tremendous is the strength of media representing the mindset of the people.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms "State-compiled History Textbooks" Product of Witch Politics
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms "State-compiled History Textbooks" Product of Witch Politics 
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea has become undisguised in its moves to distort the history though they are stuck in the abyss of ruin.
					 The puppet vice prime minister who doubles as minister of Education recently blustered at the "National Assembly" that the regime would press forward the system of introducing "state-compiled history textbooks" come what may.
					
					 The puppet Ministry of Education announced that "state-compiled textbooks" now at the stage of final examination would be posted on internet as E-books on Nov. 28 and distributed to secondary and high schools across south Korea in new school term next year on "the basis of opinion".
					
					 The Park group's action is a blatant challenge to the public mind-set at present. It is a criminal act to embellish sycophancy and treachery, fascist dictatorship and policy of escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north pursued by the successive puppet rulers including her father in a bid to benumb the younger generation's consciousness of independence and render the south Korean society conservative and falsify the truth of history. 
					
					 The Park group is justifying the "state-compiled history textbooks", claiming that "this is an issue different from the Choe Sun Sil scandal", but this is no more than a cynical play to cover up the criminal acts of monopolizing even the education in history at the prodding of such quasi religious leader and ghost witch as Choe Sun Sil. 
					
					 As the people from all walks of life in south Korea asserted, the "state-compiled history textbooks" are an inevitable product of the witch politics which has become a laughing stock of the world people.
					
					 Since the disclosure of the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal" facts about the above-said green shaman's and fortuneteller's deep interference in the issue of history were brought to light in south Korea.
					
					 Media are recalling that Park talked nonsense while ordering to introduce the above-said system that people cannot but have abnormal soul if they fail to properly learn history, adding that she talked such rubbish under Choe's religious influence. 
					
					 It was also disclosed that Kim Sang Ryul, former chief for education and culture of Chongwadae who took the lead in the retrogressive revision of history textbooks, is maternal uncle of Cha Un Thaek, ad inspector, who is the closest confidant of Choe, and Cha intervened in his personnel affairs. 
					
					 Choe Sun Sil put Park Geun Hye's all thinking and actions under her control and pulled string behind the scene. She is the "witch who governs the soul of Park".
					
					 It is truth about Park's witch politics that she administered all affairs ranging from the appointment of officials to shaping major policies as dictated by Choe. 
					
					 It goes without saying that everything including frequent meetings and formation of writing staff as regards "state-compiled history textbooks" was done according to the scenario finally examined by Choe. 
					
					 That is why people of all social standings are staging actions in various parts of south Korea in protest against the puppet regime. 
					
					 The participants in one million people candlelight action cited the introduction of "state-compiled history textbooks" as one of reasons for impeaching Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Academic circles and civic organizations are strongly holding that "they can not distribute the state-compiled history textbooks embellishing pro-Japanese acts and Park Chung-Hee to students" and even conservative teachers' organizations are joining in the struggle.
					
					 Opposition parties submitted a resolution calling for stopping and abrogating the introduction of "state-compiled history textbooks" to the NA.
					
					 The Park group is hordes of traitors who deserve a stern judgment by the nation and should be buried at an early date.
					
					 Time will clearly show what miserable end awaits those who have run against the public mindset.

articles.title: U.S. Media on Park Geun Hye Driven into Crisis of Imminent Ouster
articles.content:
U.S. Media on Park Geun Hye Driven into Crisis of Imminent Ouster
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Referring to the south Korean puppet prosecution's results of investigation into the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal" on Nov. 21, major media of the U.S. reported that the pressure on Park, who became a criminal suspect from witness, to resign is growing strong.
					 The Washington Post, quoting the data on analysis made by a special institution, said the likelihood of Park's stepping down before her term of office is 70 percent.
					
					 The Wall Street Journal said that Park made a wrong judgment such as letting "spiritual advisor" take part in "state affairs", adding the current case clearly revealed how the businessmen have influence in the south Korean society.
					
					 AP noted that it is the first time that the successive "presidents" of south Korea were related to the power-backed scandals during their term of office or after their retirement.
					
					 CNN said that Park is pressed to be ousted with low support rate for her, result of criminal acts of her confidents and her own wrongdoings.
					
					 The media said that Park lost the trust of the people and is driven into a crisis of ouster due to the recent power-backed scandal.

articles.title: S. Korean Government Employees Enter into Strike for Park's Resignation
articles.content:
S. Korean Government Employees Enter into Strike for Park's Resignation
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The Government Employees Union of south Korea on Nov. 22 declared it would start a strike for Park Geun Hye's resignation, according to Voice of People, the south Korean online paper.
					 At the press conference speakers said the results of survey of trade union members as regards the monopolization of "state affairs" confirmed that 70 percent of them approved Park's resignation.
					
					 95 percent of them resolved to take part in the actions for settling the monopolization of "state affairs", they said, adding they will join in the general strike of the Confederation of Trade Unions to be staged on Nov. 30.

articles.title: S. Korean Lawyers Association Demands Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
S. Korean Lawyers Association Demands Park Geun Hye's Resignation
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Lawyers Association in a declaration on the situation on Nov. 22 demanded Park Geun Hye step down of her own accord, owning the blame for the monopolization of "state affairs", according to Voice of People, the south Korean online paper.
					 The declaration said the "president" should step down at once as it is very dangerous that she continues to administrate the "state affairs".
					
					 It demanded the prosecution make thoroughgoing investigation into the crimes of the "president" and those concerned.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Discloses Moves of Choe Sun Sil and An Jong Bom to Destroy Evidence Proving Their Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Discloses Moves of Choe Sun Sil and An Jong Bom to Destroy Evidence Proving Their Crimes
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hankook Ilbo on Nov. 20 disclosed the fact that Choe Sun Sil and An Jong Bom, former chief secretary for policy coordination of Chongwadae, made desperate efforts to destroy evidence proving their crimes.
					 According to it, when scandals of Choe were reported by media, she phoned her confidant in south Korea from Germany on Oct. 25, instructing him to scrap all the five computers from her company.
					
					 The confidant deleted all files from the computers and destroyed hardware with a hammer.
					
					 Meanwhile, An Jong Bom in the middle of October made a phone call to the vice-president of the "National Federation of Businessmen" before prosecution's investigation and demanded he makes a false statement that An was not involved in the establishment of foundation and fund-raising.  Accordingly, the vice-president scrapped the mobile phone containing conversations and messages exchanged with An with the help of a specialist before responding to the prosecution's investigation on Oct. 25.
					
					 On Oct. 21An Jong Bom let his aide delete mobile phone messages of a director of the K Sports Foundation and the list of the foundation's directors. An gave him a document on how to respond to the prosecution's investigation.

articles.title: Truth of Park Geun Hye's Seven-hour Absence in Office Sparks Off Resentment of People
articles.content:
Truth of Park Geun Hye's Seven-hour Absence in Office Sparks Off Resentment of People
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A video on the fact that Park Geun Hye had a plastic operation during seven hours' absence in office after receiving the report on the ferry Sewol sinking was posted on the social network to spark off bitter resentment of the south Korean people from all walks of life, according to the south Korean paper Kukmin Ilbo on Nov. 20.
					 It compared Park's photo in 2012 with her photo in 2015. 
					
					 According to it, her crow's feet definitely disappeared.
					
					 There were also the photos of her image at the "state council meeting" one day before the ferry Sewol sinking and her face when making "a talk to people" on May 19, 2014, about one month after the disaster. They proved the same fact.
					
					 The number of accesses on Nov. 17 alone reached more than 321,300.
					
					 The greatly infuriated subscribers posted at least 2,000 articles denouncing Park Geun Hye that day alone.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Exposes Scandal of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Exposes Scandal of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Seoul Economic Daily on Nov. 20 reported that secretaries of Chongwadae have accumulated a lot of wealth by taking the advantage of Park Geun Hye's and Choe Sun Sil's monopolization of "state affairs", sparking off public uproar.
					 It said that secretaries of Chongwadae directly or indirectly related to the scandal are facing the prosecution's investigation.
					
					 It was disclosed in this course that they raked lots of wealth under various pretexts, it noted.

articles.title: Paper of Koreans in U.S. Demands Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
Paper of Koreans in U.S. Demands Park Geun Hye's Resignation
Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, the online paper of Koreans in the U.S., carried an article on Nov. 22 demanding an immediate resignation of Park Geun Hye.
					 It said that Park is delaying her resignation under this or that pretext despite the burning resentment of the Koreans at home and abroad.
					
					 Meanwhile, the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo on Nov. 21 said that more than one million people staged candlelight actions but Park is staying in power.
					
					 It is the emergency situation that the special-class criminal who monopolized "state affairs" is sitting at Chongwadae still now, it said, urging Park to step down at an early date.

articles.title: KCTU Chairman Condemns Crimes of Authorities
articles.content:
KCTU Chairman Condemns Crimes of Authorities
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online paper Saram Ilbo, Han Sang Gyun, chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions, condemned the puppet authorities at the final hearing on an appeal held at the puppet Seoul High Court on Nov. 21.
					 He said the group of Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil who violated democracy and monopolized the "state affairs" are not common criminals involved in bribery, fraud, embezzlement of money, etc. but the dictators and disturbers of social order.
					
					 He branded them as disturber of peace who drove the south-north relations into confrontation and brink of war, not reconciliation and co-prosperity.
					
					 He shouted that the Park Geun Hye regime is the most shameless one in the history spanning 5,000 years.
					
					 He warned that if one million people fail, five million people will order and if they fail, 10 million people will do and whoever violates democracy will be ousted from power.

articles.title: S. Korean Political Parties, Organizations Form Body for Ouster of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Political Parties, Organizations Form Body for Ouster of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- More than 40 political parties and organizations in Wonju and Hoengsong of south Korean Kangwon Province formed the Wonju-Hoengsong emergency action for ouster of Park Geun Hye on Nov. 17, according to the south Korean paper Nodong and Segye.
					 At an inaugural press conference on Nov. 21 speakers said that the people angered by the Park Geun Hye regime which monopolized the "state affairs" are turning out in the campaign to oust the regime.
					
					 At the press conference, a declaration on the formation was read out.
					
					 The declaration opposed any political dealing to prolong the Park's "presidential" office.
					
					  It demanded the resignation of Park Geun Hye and the disbandment of the "Saenuri Party" and the detention of bosses of big businesses responsible for the politics-business nexus.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Demands Park Geun Hye Step Down
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Demands Park Geun Hye Step Down
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on Nov. 21 in an editorial condemned the "president" for defying even the judicial system.
					 Saying that according to the written arraignment, suspicions about Park Geun Hye are more serious than expected, the paper stressed that Park was branded as an accomplice but she is the chief culprit in the light of the role played by her.
					
					 No pretence will work on as the prosecution declared Park as an accomplice, the paper noted, and continued:
					
					 Park Geun Hye's hold-out is a betrayal and act of treachery against the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Writers' Organizations Issue Declaration in Situation Demanding Park Geun Hye Step Down
articles.content:
S. Korean Writers' Organizations Issue Declaration on Situation Demanding Park Geun Hye Step Down
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Five writers' organizations representing progress and conservatism in the field of literature of south Korea issued a declaration on the situation on Nov. 21 demanding Park Geun Hye step down, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 The declaration said power has been used for serving the self-interests and desire of individuals like Choe Sun Sil. 
					
					 Persons of literature are the direct witness and victim of the Park Geun Hye's and Choe Sun Sil's monopolization of "state affairs", it noted, adding:
					
					 The Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism has persistently attempted to tame persons of literature through the committee of culture and arts.

articles.title: S. Korean People Protest against Authorities' Pro-Japanese Acts
articles.content:
S. Korean People Protest against Authorities' Pro-Japanese Acts
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- South Korean people of different social standings strongly denounce the puppet group for concluding the agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan.
					 The People's Emergency Action for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime and five other civic and social organizations held a press conference outside the building of the puppet government in Seoul on Nov. 22.
					
					 Speakers said with concern that the above-said agreement as an institutional mechanism for building the missile shield involving south Korea, U.S. and Japan would support Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" and preemptive attack on the north and play the role of upgrading the south Korea-Japan relations to a military alliance.
					
					 They called for impeachment of the defense minister who is taking the lead in adopting of the above-said agreement with Japan.
					
					 At the end of the press conference the organizations staged protest actions near the puppet government building and Chongwadae.
					
					 The puppet authorities unhesitatingly passed the agreement through the "state council meeting" that day despite strong opposition of people from all walks of life.
					
					 In this regard, a parliamentary spokesman for the Minju Party condemned the agreement as a humiliating country-selling agreement which the people do not recognize.
					
					 The chairman of the emergency measure committee and floor leader of the Kukmin Party said the party would propose a motion calling for dismissal of the defense minister.
					
					 A secretary of the Kukmin Party said he could not recognize the legitimacy of the agreement railroaded by the "president" having support rate less than 5 percent.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Commemorated in Gunma Prefecture, Japan
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Commemorated in Gunma Prefecture, Japan
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A Gunma Prefectural preparatory committee for commemorating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed.
					 Kiichi Tsunota, co－representative of the Gunma Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to organize significant colorful cultural events on the occasion of the birth anniversaries.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Kyoto Prefecture, Japan
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Kyoto Prefecture, Japan
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A Kyoto Prefectural, Japan, preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed on Nov. 10.
					 Takashi Ishida, advisor to the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net for Promoting Cultural, Academic and Citizens Exchange and ex-chairman of the Kyoto Prefectural Assembly, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful cultural events such as meeting and lecture to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Norway
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Norway
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Norway on Nov. 17.
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary life and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Thailand
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Thailand
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A Thai committee for remembering HE Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 17.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events such as meeting and seminar on the 5th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador argelino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador argelino
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, recibio el dia 23 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular en la RPDC, Ahcene Boukhelfa.
					Acto seguido, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Efectuado acto por 6o aniversario de triunfo en combate de la isla Yonphyong
articles.content:
Efectuado acto por 6o aniversario de triunfo en combate de la isla Yonphyong
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en el distrito de Kangryong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur la reunion conjunta de militares y civiles para celebrar el 6o aniversario de la victoria en el combate de fuego artillero de la isla Yonphyong.
					La victoria en esa batalla de hace 6 anos, que hizo sufrir una derrota amarga a los belicistas titeres surcoreanos quienes atentaron contra la soberania y la dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fue un evento que demostro una vez mas cuan tragico es el fin de los provocadores enloquecidos por la confrontacion fratricida. Y deviene la declaracion resuelta de que nuestro justo golpe de represalia no sabe la piedad a los enemigos.
					
					Participaron en el acto el jefe del 4o cuerpo del EPC, Ri Song Guk, el presidente del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, Pak Yong Ho, los oficiales y soldados del EPC inclusive los uniformados participantes en el combate y los funcionarios y trabajadores del distrito de Kangryong.
					
					Con anterioridad, los trabajadores del distrito felicitaron con collares y ramos de flores a los uniformados que realizaron meritos en la batalla.
					
					Intervino primero el jefe del 4o cuerpo Ri Song Guk.
					
					El orador dijo que la victoria fulminante en el combate de fuego artillero fue un gran acontecimiento que demostro a todo el mundo el impetu invencible del heroico EPC, bajo la guia de los Generales Insignes del Songun, y escribio otra pagina de triunfo en la historia de la Corea del Songun.
					
					El presidente del Comite del PTC en el distrito de Kangryong, Kim Pong Hyon, pronuncio el discurso de felicitacion.
					
					Le siguieron en usar la palabra el oficial del EPC Ri Hyon Myong y el suboficial Kim Ryong Jin, participantes en el combate, y el primer secretario del Comite de la Union de la Juventud en el distrito de Kangryong, Jong Song Guk.
					
					Acto seguido, se ofrecio la funcion de felicitacion de los miembros del grupo de propaganda artistica de la unidad militar y del grupo de agitacion artistica movil del distrito.

articles.title: Es grande la fuerza de prensa que representa la opinion publica: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Es grande la fuerza de prensa que representa la opinion publica: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- "JTBC", "Kukmin Ilbo", "OhmyNews", "Minjok Ilbo" y otros medios de prensa surcoreanos siguen revelando en estos dias los detalles del escandalo politico sin precedentes causado por la traidora Park Geun-hye. 
					El periodico online "Voz del Pueblo" califico el presente incidente de tremendo "caso de perturbacion de la disciplina estatal" que no puede suceder ni en el periodo feudal siquiera.
					
					Los medios de prensa se hacen ecos de las voces de condena de diversos sectores y hasta las fuentes conservadoras ultraderechistas dan espaldas a la traidora burlandose de su situacion miserable. 
					
					Como opino la cadena "CBS", la indignacion del pueblo por el escandalo fue el factor que reunio a mas de un millon de surcoreanos, por encima de diferencias de ideales y criterios politicos, en el mismo mitin de protestas.
					
					Las actividades de prensa, que revelan la verdad del escandalo politico superando las diferencias entre el progreso y el conservadurismo, son las justas encaminadas a cumplir con su responsabilidad y papel como portavoz de justicia y verdad y precursor de la epoca. 
					
					Como revelaron los medios de prensa, el escandalo politico no es un incidente privado de Choe Sun Sil y algunos subordinados de Chongwadae y de los organos administrativos sino el de corrupcion signado de abuso del poder que fue causado por culpa de Park Geun-hye, jefa de las fuerzas conservadoras.
					
					El caso de las Fundaciones MIR y K-Sports es producto inevitable de la gobernacion traidora de ella que no vacila en llevar a la muerte toda la sociedad surcoreana para el enriquecimiento de si misma y sus coparticipes. 
					
					La realidad deja conocer claramente que mientras la traidora y las fuerzas conservadoras permanezcan en el poder, se repetira el escandalo de ahora. 
					
					La encolerizada opinion publica demanda eliminar por completo la corrupta tendencia politica surcoreana.
					
					Es irrevocable la severa sentencia que dicto la opinion publica contra Park quien teme mas la unidad entre la voluntad del pueblo y la prensa. 
					
					Por eso, ella insistio en que la revelacion del escandalo es un "gran complot" de algunos medios de prensa y los partidos opositores y hasta reprimio a las fuentes que reportaron el incidente de intervencion de Jong Yun Hoe en "asuntos estatales" acusandolas de "revelacion de documentos".
					
					Para evadir la represion de la dictadura fascista y buscar la verdadera libertad, los medios de prensa deben cumplir su deber de hacerse ecos de las voces del pueblo, en lugar de servir como trompeteros venales y guardias del "poder".
					
					Es grande la fuerza de la prensa que representa la opinion publica.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la "redaccion del manual de historia por Estado" en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la "redaccion del manual de historia por Estado" en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Pese a su situacion tan critica a punto de arruinamiento, la banda de Park Geun-hye no deja su intento de tergiversar la historia.
					Recientemente, el vicepremier y ministro de Educacion surcoreano dijo en la "Asamblea Nacional" que promovera sin falta el "sistema de redaccion del manual de historia por el Estado".
					
					El Ministerio de Educacion del Sur de Corea anuncio oficialmente que publicara el dia 28 en Internet los "manuales redactados por el Estado" en formato digital y los distribuira a las escuelas secundarias y superiores de todas las regiones en visperas del nuevo curso escolar del ano proximo.
					
					Ademas de ser un desafio a la opinion publica de hoy, esa locura constituye un crimen antinacional encaminado a paralizar la conciencia independiente de las nuevas generaciones y hace reinar en toda la sociedad surcoreana el conservadurismo, al hacer apologia del servilismo a grandes potencias, la dictadura fascista y la politica de confrontacion fratricida de los anteriores gobernantes, inclusive el padre de Park Geun-hye.
					
					La horda de Park esta justificando la "redaccion del manual de historia por el Estado" diciendo que "es un problema aparte del escandalo de Choe Sun Sil".
					
					Como opinan unanimemente los surcoreanos de distintos sectores, la compilacion de ese tipo es un producto inevitable de la vergonzosa politica de brujeria que practico Park.
					
					Despues de revelado el "escandalo de Park Geun-hye-Choe Sun Sil", en el Sur de Corea se van revelando los hechos de que la bruja (Choe) intervino mucho en el problema de la historia.
					
					Los medios de prensa transmiten que al iniciar la "redaccion por el Estado", Park dijo palabras extranas como "si no se aprende correctamente la historia, sera anormal el alma" porque habia recibido las influencias religiosas de Choe.
					
					Asi Choe era la bruja que dominaba el espiritu de la mandataria.
					
					Esta cumplio todos los mandatos de Choe en todas las cuestiones estatales desde el nombramiento de funcionarios publicos hasta la elaboracion de politicas importantes.
					
					Por lo tanto, los habitantes surcoreanos despliegan por doquier el movimiento de protestas al respecto, por ejemplo, el reciente mitin de un millon con velas encendidas.
					
					Se suman a las protestas el circulo academico y las entidades civiles y hasta las de ensenantes conservadores.
					
					Los partidos opositores presentaron a la "Asamblea Nacional" el proyecto de resolucion que exige parar la "redaccion por el Estado".
					
					La opinion publica surcoreana de hoy no perdona nunca esa locura.
					
					El tiempo demostrara claramente cuan tragico sera el fin de los que marchan a contrapelo de la opinion publica.
